title: Say Yes
description: I broke all the rules.He knows my true self. Our relationship is far from a game. I've never felt this close to a man.James Riviera is everything I never knew I wanted. Powerful, sexy, alluring, and completely mine.Now he wants to make me his wife.I only have to say yes and I'll have forever, but forever isn't as lasting as people believe.
author: Lucia Franco
